thread.title_full: International Aviation & Space Salon in Russia attended by Jordan KingTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: International Aviation & Space Salon in Russia attended by Jordan KingTravelandtourworld.com
text:
International Aviation & Space Salon in Russia attended by Jordan King Published on : Thursday, August 27, 2015
The International Aviation & Space Salon (MAKS) was attended by Jordan King Abdullah II, on Tuesday. The King was received by Russian President, Vladimir Putin upon arrival.
The International Aviation & Space Salon (MAKS) was held between Aug 25 and 30, in the city of Zhukovsky, south-east of Moscow.
King Abdullah, President Putin and heads of delegations participating in the show, attended air performances by the Russian air force.
They also toured the exhibition, which is one of the largest and most important international aviation and air defence industries exhibitions in the world.
The King and heads of delegations were briefed on the latest technologies, produced by Russian companies, in the field of military air defence systems and their advanced technology.
The show, which is held annually, saw the signing of purchase and cooperation agreements between many countries and Russian specialised companies in the military, defence and aviation industry.
